content: Hi, I have been waiting in the queue for 2 hrs and it is almost my turn, but I have class right now. Is there something I can do to save my spot or should I just hop on the queue again? Thanks
subject: help on pset4

content: Should I just remove myself? I'm in position 5, but I am in class right now.
When do you get out of class? If it's before 5 pm, you can remove yourself now, and when you get out of class + rejoin the queue we can claim you immediately.
